body: OK, so I haven't been on in a few days. And probably won't be on a lot any more, I've got bored of minecraft and I am going to spend a lot more time playing football with friends, and hoping that I don't get another friend with a broken thumb. I will still play online (maybe once a week) but I'm not going to be online as much. I'll still be on the forums though :)
